projects.title: Movie List
projects.description: Movie List is a project that displays a list of films, with the option of filtering films by year. Once logged in, users can delete a film or add a new one.

projects.title: Kasa
projects.description: Kasa is a project that displays a list of several flats. Clicking on a flat displays all its features.

projects.title: Argent Bank
projects.description: Argent Bank is a project that allows you to interact with an API, authenticate yourself and change your nickname instantly.
